lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Feb. 1 (UP) -- Rumors that Germany desires the use of Bizerte and Sfax, French bases in Tunisia, and Toulon, naval station on the French Mediterranean Coast, have circulated here for the last few days, but it was said tonight that no formal demands of this nature had been received from Reichsfuehrer Hitler.
abstract: Vichy repts no formal bid for bases

keywords.name: glocations
